terms.common_mistakes: Holes at turns; Uneven shaping
terms.pro_tips: Use wrap and turn; German short rows for invisible turns
terms.best_use_cases: Bust darts, sock heels, collar shaping

terms.description: Visible lines or gaps between stitches, usually from tension issues.
terms.common_mistakes: Inconsistent tension; Wrong hook size
terms.pro_tips: Keep consistent tension; Try smaller hook; Practice rhythm

terms.description: When crochet fabric leans or curves instead of lying flat.
terms.common_mistakes: Ignoring early signs; Wrong turning chain height
terms.pro_tips: Check turning chain count; Consistent first stitch placement

terms.description: Digital crochet pattern file that can be downloaded and printed.
terms.common_mistakes: Not checking printer settings; Losing downloaded files
terms.pro_tips: Save to cloud storage; Print test page first; Check scaling

terms.description: Quick Response code linking to pattern videos or corrections.
terms.common_mistakes: Not having QR reader app; Broken links
terms.pro_tips: Use phone camera app; Check for pattern updates

terms.description: Mesh-based crochet technique creating patterns with filled and open squares.
terms.common_mistakes: Uneven mesh; Misreading charts
terms.pro_tips: Keep consistent chain spaces; Use stitch markers for large pieces

terms.description: Traditional lace technique using motifs connected with mesh backgrounds.
terms.common_mistakes: Poor motif joining; Inconsistent tension
terms.pro_tips: Make motifs first; Plan layout; Use fine thread

terms.description: Published corrections or updates to crochet patterns.
terms.common_mistakes: Not checking for errata; Using outdated versions
terms.pro_tips: Check designer websites; Join pattern groups; Save corrections

terms.description: Process of making patterns before publication to find errors.
terms.common_mistakes: Not following exactly; Poor feedback
terms.pro_tips: Take detailed notes; Photo everything; Meet deadlines
terms.best_use_cases: Getting free patterns and building designer relationships

terms.description: Crochet hook designed to reduce hand strain and improve comfort.
terms.common_mistakes: Wrong size grip; Not trying different brands
terms.pro_tips: Try before buying; Consider grip size; Look for cushioned handles
terms.best_use_cases: Long crochet sessions, arthritis, hand pain

terms.description: Mathematical approach to increases for perfect circles (6, 12, 18, 24...).
terms.common_mistakes: Inconsistent increase placement; Wrong ratios
terms.pro_tips: Use stitch markers; 6 increases per round for circles
terms.best_use_cases: Perfect circles, mandalas, flat amigurumi bases

terms.description: Intentional crochet practice focusing on present moment awareness.
terms.common_mistakes: Rushing; Not focusing on process
terms.pro_tips: Focus on stitch rhythm; Breathe deeply; Choose simple patterns
terms.best_use_cases: Stress relief, meditation, mental health support

terms.description: Thick, comfortable hook handles that reduce hand strain. Popular brands include Chunky Boy, Clover Amour, and others.
terms.common_mistakes: Wrong size for your hand; Not trying different shapes
terms.pro_tips: Test different thicknesses; Consider hand size; Look for non-slip surfaces
terms.best_use_cases: Long crochet sessions, arthritis, comfort improvement

terms.description: Ceramic or wooden bowl with slot to keep yarn from rolling away while crocheting.
terms.common_mistakes: Bowl too small; Sharp edges that catch yarn
terms.pro_tips: Choose size for your yarn; Look for smooth slots; Consider weight

terms.description: Specialized bag for keeping crochet project and supplies organized.
terms.common_mistakes: Bag too small; No compartments for tools
terms.pro_tips: Consider project size; Look for multiple pockets; Choose good zippers

terms.description: Specific combination of colors in variegated or multi-colored yarn.
terms.common_mistakes: Not considering how colors pool; Mismatched dye lots
terms.pro_tips: Buy enough from same dye lot; Consider color dominance
terms.best_use_cases: Yarn selection, color planning, matching projects

terms.description: Small test piece to check gauge and practice stitches before starting project.
terms.common_mistakes: Making swatch too small; Not blocking swatch
terms.pro_tips: Make 6+ inches square; Block like finished project; Measure carefully
